Name: House of Shadow
About the game: House of Shadow is an action-adventure metroidvania. Explore, traverse obstacles, evade monsters, slay fearsome bosses, and claim the Shadow Throne! You are a young sorcerer, wielding shadow powers against legions of light in an attempt to claim the Shadow Throne and correct the catastrophic imbalance between light and darkness. Features As indie as it gets: Developed entirely by one person Multiple areas and bosses Precise platforming Challenging combat Rewarding upgrades to make your character more powerful 2-3 hours in length
